title: correspondenceData-prefill
description: Simplified data model for consumers to prefill the Correspondence form via multipart instantiation. Requestor is not included - it is automatically filled from the logged-in user via ER/DSF registers.

inquiryMessage.description: Content of message or inquiry from customer. Free text.

domain.description: Concerned field of expertise. Valid values: trademark, design, patent, other

contactReference.description: Customer's case reference number from NIPO

ipCases.description: List of IP case identifiers (application numbers, IP right numbers, etc.)
